name: Care For Society
briefDescription: Care for Society is working exclusively on 12 different projects and our main objective is to help deprived and downtrodden. One of our major project is Muskan under which we treat physically and mentally challenged kids and try to make their life better for their self reliance. Apart of project Muskan we work for enviroment protection, child labor, gender abuse, campaigns for blood donation, food distribution, cloth distribution and many more.One of our another focus is to help the poor patients who are struggling financially for their treatment.
